dialogue.message: You'll need some armor and weapons to defeat Ten-Eyed One, so head to our Forge. It is located North-West of Sleeping Boar Inn. You should meet Macklel there.
Yes, I heard about you. <name>, wasn't it? Apparently you woke up with amnesia and lost all your stuff. Is that true?
I have my ways. You need armor and weapons right?
dialogue.option1: Yeah, do you have any spares?

dialogue.message: Unfortunately no. However, you did give me this sword yesterday. You said it was a "junk" sword and was useless. Here, I'll give it to you.
dialogue.option1: Thanks a lot! What should I do next?

dialogue.message: You should return to Adecus. He probably knows where you should go next.
